The guild's been active for a few decades. We were formed by some of the explorers that settled down here.
I've only been in the guild for a few months. Seems like a good gig so far. We get first dibs on new finds, and discounts for guild services.
Ive been doing this guild stuff for a while, but something's seemed weird recently. Like there is more tension in the air.
My dad was in the guild, and his dad. I dont really want to do this, but the perks are alright I guess.
There's guild offices in most of the settlements. There's also huge guild forts here and there. They usually have more going on.
